snippet: The filmmaker Joe Berlinger, who, with a directing partner, Bruce Sinofsky, has chronicled the saga of the West Memphis Three, did so as advocate and journalist.
abstract: Filmmaker Joe Berlinger and directing partner Bruce Sinofsky, work as both journalists and advocates in their search for the truth; film Paradise Lost 3: Purgatory, about the West Memphis Three and film Crude about the environmental crisis in Ecuador, are prime examples of their passion.
lead_paragraph: The filmmaker Joe Berlinger, who, with a directing partner, Bruce Sinofsky, has chronicled the saga of the West Memphis Three, did so as advocate and journalist.

headline.seo: Filmmakers as Advocates in ‘Paradise Lost’ Series
headline.main: Filmmakers Take Dual Roles in Quest for Truth
